title: Looking for a cuneiform font for Mac OSX (Unicode)
content:
I'm searching for a ancient CUNEIFORM FONT, which is working on MacOSX (Unicode).  
Can anybody help me?

Regards, Andrea
author: Frau Krause

comments.content:
Haha. Good joke!  
It is not that easy.  
I'm already searching for 3 weeks without a working result.

No comment on the quality (because I haven't looked), but you could try [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20111213133552/http:/reinhold.kainhofer.com/rk_fonts/).

This I found through the fine folks at [SIL](http://web.archive.org/web/20111213133552/http:/www.sil.org/) (formerly the Summer Institute of Linguistics), whose resources you should check for typography resources on any endangered language.

Thank you! I have that already, but I have problems with the font format. I'm not able to load it, so that I can work with it. I'll try it now with Fontlab.  
And I try SIL.
